Articles.Content:
As head of walrus.co I am asking you todo my company and kerbalkind a favor

MISSION: we want you to "revive" the Magic Boulder around Ike by moving an asteroid to the Duna system (Ike is preferred)

(Bigger is better)We also would like the asteroid to be as big as possible, this way we would be able so see it from out telescopes.

asteriod orbiting Duna-100 pts

asteriod orbiting Ike-150 pts

asteriod in a polar orbit around Ike-200pts

A class +5 pts

B class+15pts

C class+25pts

D class+40pts

E class+50pts

Good luck!

- - - Updated - - -

Points cont.

manned +20pts

RULES

proof must be provided such as pictures and the flight log (press f3)

if there are a ton of pictures, put a spoiler on it (to prevent lag)

no mods except kethane and Kerbal alarm clock if you plan on returning home!

no cheats except part-clipping

- - - Updated - - -

EDIT

IF YOU DO USE KETHANE, THAT WILL BE -10 points, KAC is free

and yes this is possible.

Leaderboard

1st: Cantab

2nd: Billionate44

3rd

4th

5th

Participants:

Billionate44

cantab

Edited February 10, 2015 by MrWalrus123
No mods except the one I have, because I'm too lazy to download new ones, and I don't want to give up the advantage of the one I already have!
If that mod is not kethane, you can't use it, and proof of you not using it must be shown
Are we allowed to use Kerbal Alarm Clock?

Mods such as KAC, FAR, and NEAR are allowed free (no points lost) mods such as kethane an KAS will be -10 points mods such as hyper edit, warp drive mods (interstellar is an example) and any mod that is op is not allowed

you also need proof showing you didn't use the non-allowed mods.

Yes, graphic mods (skyboxes, clouds, etc.) are allowed

good luck!

Edited December 30, 2014 by MrWalrus123
You take your score and subtract how many points it says (kethane minus 10 points)
If you are participating, say so below! (That rhymes!)
Cool, just make sure to post pictures! Good luck

Sorry for taking so long, I hope video proof is good enough. You can just skip through parts and mute the sound.

12

Class C Asteroid-25 points

Ike Orbit-150 points

Manned-20 points

Edited January 27, 2015 by biollante44

Heh, I did this mission a while ago actually.

My boulder, a 68-ton C-class. I know I overdid the glow:

Its orbit round Ike:

The lengthy mission album: https://flic.kr/s/aHsjWATHny Five launches, numerous rendezvous and dockings, and several fatal crashes. But some of the crew at least did live to walk on Kerbin again!

The mission was stock aside from the usual info mods (KER, KAC, PreciseNode, maybe others). Though I had kethane installed I didn't use it on this mission.

I make it 245 points.

[EDIT]

when you do this, please put how many points you scored!
What the heck, I'll give this a shot.
